about_the_game:
In Anime Studio Saga, embark on a thrilling journey through the dynamic world of anime creation. Kickstart your anime production dreams, beginning your creative venture drawing manga in your mom's house. Immerse yourself in meticulously crafted settings as you conceptualize and develop your initial anime projects. Acquire expertise, unlock innovative possibilities, and even craft your own animation teams.

Shape Your Anime Creations
Every decision you make during development profoundly impacts your success. Will you prioritize immersive storytelling, or focus on captivating visuals and animation? Your choices will shape the destiny of your anime, determining its popularity and critical acclaim.

Evolve Your Studio
After achieving success with several manga releases, move out of your mom's house by moving into more spacious and sophisticated offices. Recruit talented staff, provide training, and unlock a plethora of new creative options. The path to becoming a renowned anime studio awaits.

Craft Elaborate and Ambitious Anime
Armed with experience and a skilled team, venture into the realm of larger and more intricate anime productions. Face new challenges that come with creating expansive narratives and intricate animation sequences. Skillful team management is the key to delivering blockbuster anime hits.

Key Features

Design and Develop Anime

Insights through Fan Comments

Research Genres For Stories

Manage Custom Anime Teams

Expand into Grand Studios

Forge an Elite Anime Development Team

short_description: Embark on Anime Studio Saga! Go from a Manga Artist living with your mom to establishing your anime studio, create chart-topping series, developing talent, and pioneer new stories. Ascend to industry leadership, captivating a global fanbase as the unparalleled anime visionary!
